title: WTT: Doyle Bat & Doughety Arm In Air for SC460-42 counterparts

posts.post_title: WTT: Doyle Bat & Doughety Arm In Air for SC460-42 counterparts
posts.post_content: Willing to trade these SGC 40s for their Sweet Caporal 350-460 Factory 42 (no overprint) counterpart in any condition.
